title: My Apologies, But This Has To Be Said (Ep 1584)
description:
We cannot turn into a circular firing squad. In this episode, I discuss something that happened to me yesterday that reflects on where we are. I also address the misinformation campaign against Florida and Texas. 

News Picks:

New poll shows that Democrats prefer socialism.

DHS dropped 40,000 covid infected migrants in US cities.


Huge news in the war against big tech censorship. 


New data on the vaccine is troubling.


BLM is a Marxist group, and the public knows it.

Was Obama's party a superspreader event?


Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
